DOC.brief_summary: This study design develop clinical registry Peripheral Arterial Disease ( PAD ) patient undergo low extremity revascularization describe population assess comparative effectiveness endovascular therapy versus surgery . In addition , study conduct prospective cohort study patient treat medically undergo low extremity revascularization VA Kaiser Colorado compare change health status .
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Medical Therapy , Endovascular Therapy , Surgery Peripheral Arterial Disease
DOC.detailed_description: Using electronic medical record , registry patient undergo low extremity revascularization therapy identify . Chart review do expert panel . The prospective cohort study ask participant complete health status survey begin therapy PAD 6 month later .
DOC.criteria: present PAD , > 18 year age , complete questionnaire , either change PAD low extremity intervention start new intervention ( surgical , endovascular , medical therapy ( cilostazol exercise regimen ) dementia , inability consent , pregnancy , limited life expectancy ( < 6 month ) , previous endovascular surgical revascularization within previous 12 month , non English speaking
